name: Peter Pack Rat
description: Peter Pack Rat is a 1985 platform game developed and released by Atari Games for the Atari System 1 arcade hardware. The game was programmed by Peter Thompson, with graphics by Debbie Hayes and music by Brad Fuller. The game was only produced in small quantities, either as a standalone cabinet or as an upgrade kit to existing ones (Atari part no. 136028). It was ported to the Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum home computers in 1989 by Software Creations and released by Silverbird Software, with the Commodore 64 version featuring arranged music by Tim Follin.
